text: Aubrometz is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France. ==Geography== A small village located 25 miles (40 km) west of Arras at the junction of the D340 roads, in the valley of the Canche river. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Thomas Becket, dating from the fifteenth century ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Aubrometz
